subject: HTML
question:
Write the code to show an autocomplete box that will have this characteristics:

1. It will have a label at the left "Question...?", that will be bound to the input.
2. It will have an input with name and id with the value "question", that will be bound to a list "suggestions_list".
3. As possible answers we will have only 2 options, "Suggestion1" and "Suggestion2".
